channel.title: How to Change the Max level
channel.description: Hey guys, Does anyone Know how to change the level ,Or give me a link To a tutorial, It would be muchly appreciated

item.title: How to Change the Max level
item.dc:creator: @0wn3r_tom 0wn3r tom
item.description:
@0wn3r_tom wrote:

search for this,

	public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

then you should see something like this,

[code] public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

		for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
    		return lvl;
		}
		}
		return 99;

}[/code]

change the

lvl <=99;

and

return 99;

to any lvl you want

Read full topic
item.source: How to Change the Max level
